nodes.text: Star Wars: Force and Destiny Beta

The Star Wars: Force and Destiny Beta is a limited-edition softcover rulebook published by Fantasy Flight Games for the Star Wars: Force and Destiny roleplaying game. It debuted at Gen Con 2014 and was released through retailers on September 10, 2014.

The Force and Destiny Beta includes the introductory campaign mission Lost Knowledge and came with seven character sheets, six with pre-made characters: Tik'A'Moris, Dal Kir, Sal Sor'Chan, Markus Dorivonn, Zora Sasori, and Kasuni Tamm.

In the Star Wars®: Force and Destiny™ roleplaying game, you and your friends assume the roles of characters who possess the rare and dangerous ability to touch and use the Force, the energy field that binds and surrounds every living thing. It is up to you whether you use this power to try and fight the forces of injustice and oppression, or if you give into the darkness and temptation within and become an agent of evil.
